page.title: 18HOUSING IN CLANFIELD
page.content: The area is sparsely populated with a few scattered houses and cottages including some former farm houses. The only exception is in the extreme south of the area into which Clanfield has expanded.Here there is some new development on the site of Ivy House Farm,consisting of sheltered accomodation for retired people,called The Swallows.It is an owner_occupied complex of which 37 of the 53 planned units have been completed.The original farm house,Orchard House,has been converted into 4 flats,whilst the new development consists of 33 units plus a communal lounge and laundry room. There is a resident warden in attendance.Each flat is designed to be fully independant,giving residents complete privacy but also facilities to socialise should they so desire.
